metadata.description:
Vintage romance comics from a more innocent age!

From the 1960s until the 1990s, STAR - Love Stories in Pictures entertained eager readers with book-length romantic dramas in comic strip form. Delving into these timeless tales - like revisiting love letters from the past - we bring you a classic STAR selection of -

Tales heaving with passion, and yesteryear's fashion,
Of secret embraces in exotic places,
Jealous glances, and star-crossed romances,
Wedding belles, and heartache hells,
Intrigue, danger, the longing gaze of a stranger,
And the quivering bliss of a long-sought kiss!
metadata.name: STAR - Love Stories in Pictures
